job_tasks.phrase: Wij zoeken ervaren AI-engineers die mooie softwareproducten willen maken voor eindgebruikers met inzet van AI.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly states the core responsibility of creating software products for end-users, with AI being a component of those products, aligning with the definition of developing and integrating AI features into applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Het omzetten van deze scans naar nauwkeurige metingen hebben we dankzij AI weten te automatiseren en versnellen.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the application of AI to automate and accelerate a process, which is a form of integration into existing workflows to improve efficiency, fitting the 'integration' aspect of the category.

job_tasks.phrase: In dit project hebben we een proof-of-concept ontwikkeld van een slimme en betrouwbare AI-assistent die zorgvragen begrijpt en passende hulp kan bieden.
job_tasks.justification: Developing a proof-of-concept for an AI assistant that understands queries and provides help is a clear example of building an AI-powered software feature.

job_tasks.phrase: Onze AI-programmeurs werken altijd nauw samen met onze front-enders, back-enders en app-ontwikkelaars.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the collaborative nature of software development, where AI engineers work alongside other software development roles (front-end, back-end), reinforcing the 'software development' aspect.

job_tasks.phrase: De focus van onze AI-engineers is het bouwen van oplossingen.
job_tasks.justification: This broadly states the primary task is building solutions, which in this context refers to software solutions incorporating AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Ze hebben een goed beeld van de bestaande AI-technieken en hoe deze ingezet kunnen worden.
job_tasks.justification: Understanding how AI techniques can be deployed implies integrating them into practical applications, which falls under software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Maar onze AI-experts hebben ook hands on ervaring in het ontwikkelen van robuuste softwareproducten (op basis van bijvoorbeeld cloud- en data-engineering) waarin AI ingezet wordt om het leven van de consument makkelijker te maken.
job_tasks.justification: This is a very strong indicator for 'Software Development & Integration' as it explicitly mentions hands-on experience in developing robust software products using AI to improve consumer life, and mentions supporting fields like cloud and data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: flexibel en creatief meedenken met de klant over hoe AI in te zetten in hun projecten, en of AI voor hen wel de juiste oplossing is.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the need to understand client needs and assess the suitability of AI for their projects, which aligns with understanding the business context and translating needs into technical requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: De verwachting is dat jij de projecten kan dragen en ervoor zorgt dat het project goed wordt opgeleverd.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates responsibility for project delivery and success, which requires understanding project goals and business context, fitting the 'Business Understanding & Strategy' category.

job_tasks.phrase: op basis van bijvoorbeeld cloud- en data-engineering
job_tasks.justification: Mentioning cloud and data engineering as a basis for developing software products points towards the operational aspects of deploying and managing AI-enabled systems, aligning with MLOps principles.

soft_skills.phrase: Onze projecten voeren we altijd uit met een team. Onze AI-programmeurs werken altijd nauw samen met onze front-enders, back-enders en app-ontwikkelaars.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the collaborative nature of the work, emphasizing teamwork and close cooperation with other development roles.

soft_skills.phrase: De bijna tien AI-engineers binnen Q42 wisselen veel kennis uit door ervaringen met elkaar en met andere collega's te delen. Dat gebeurt via Slack, door samen op kantoor in een uitdaging te duiken en tijdens de regelmatige AI-overleggen.
soft_skills.justification: This describes active knowledge sharing and collaboration through various channels like Slack and meetings, fitting the communication and collaboration category.

soft_skills.phrase: Tech zit in de kern van alles wat we doen. Onze teams van developers en projectleiders zijn altijd bezig met snel uitproberen, leren en verbeteren.
soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on 'trying out, learning, and improving' indicates a culture of continuous learning and adaptation to new technologies and methods.

soft_skills.phrase: flexibel en creatief meedenken met de klant over hoe AI in te zetten in hun projecten, en of AI voor hen wel de juiste oplossing is.
soft_skills.justification: The requirement to 'think flexibly and creatively with the client' about AI implementation suggests an innovative and proactive approach to problem-solving.

soft_skills.phrase: De verwachting is dat jij de projecten kan dragen en ervoor zorgt dat het project goed wordt opgeleverd.
soft_skills.justification: The expectation to 'carry the projects' and ensure successful delivery implies taking ownership and responsibility for the outcome.

profile.rationale: The job ad heavily emphasizes the development of 'mooie softwareproducten' and 'robuuste softwareproducten' where AI is a component. While AI techniques are mentioned, the core focus is on building and integrating these into applications, supported by cloud and data engineering. The role involves collaboration with front-end and back-end developers, and the AI aspect serves to enhance existing software products rather than being the sole focus of model development or deep AI research. The tasks are predominantly from Macro-Category A (Software Development & Integration), with a clear mention of AI integration, fitting the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the nature of the role, explicitly stating the focus on building software products with AI integration and collaboration with other software engineering disciplines. The examples provided further solidify this understanding. The language used directly maps to the definitions in the coding book, leaving little room for ambiguity.
